title: The Ham artist = The Face on the bar room floor [SOUND]
creator_credit: W H Productions, Mack Sennett Comedies, Mack Sennett and Charles Chaplin
brief_description: A burlesque of the famous poem by Hugh Antoine D’Arcy of the broken-down artist who, having lost his wife to another man, draws her face on the floor and then passes out, drunk. Sound version with piano accompaniament.
